title: (BONUS EP) Pandemic Problems (With Senator Kyrsten Sinema)
description: This month, the gals are joined by Arizona's Senator Kyrsten Sinema to chat plagues, legislation, and the idiocy in between. Topics include the origins of quarantine, some REALLY shady stock transactions, and a speedy dose of karma (or is it just science?). Pour a big ol' cup of whatever you have in your dusty liquor cabinet, embrace the 5G, and tune in for Pandemic Problems. For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
